text: Magda Kósáné Kovács (November 4, 1940 – July 27, 2020) was a Hungarian politician. He was a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) for the Hungarian Socialist Party, part of the Party of European Socialists from 2004 to 2009. She joined Democratic Coalition in 2011. Kósáné Kovács died in Budapest on July 27, 2020 at the age of 79.Elhunyt Kósáné Kovács Magda ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Budapest Category:MEPs for Hungary
title: Magda Kósáné Kovács
